name: Connection of Four
description:
Play the classic game.

- Play against your friends either online or locally.

- Challenge the computer to see how good you really are.

- Unlock a multitude of different discs to show off your skill to your opponents.

- Game Center leaderboards and achievements.

- Multiple AI difficulties.

- iPhone 5 screen support.

- Universal app that works on both iPad and iPhone.

This app will constantly be updated and improved. If you have any feedback or suggestions on what you would like to see, please contact us at: NicholasDeanApps@gmail.com
